episodes.name: 16-Minute Meals: Cowboy Favorites
episodes.overview: Start the clock! Ree Drummond is sharing 16-minute cowboy and cowgirl favorites from her kitchen on the ranch. There's superfast and supertasty Steak Medallions and Potatoes followed by quick Gnocchi with Chorizo and Corn. Then she makes sweet Crisp in a Pinch and a Chicken Jalapeno Popper Quesadilla for a quick snack.

episodes.name: 3 Apps and a Cocktail
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond has cocktail hour and a summer party on her mind; she puts her ranch kitchen spin on a BBQ shrimp cocktail, makes irresistible buffalo chicken meatball skewers, bakes bacon ranch cheesy bread and mixes up blueberry-basil limeade.

episodes.name: Summer Celebration
episodes.overview: It's all about summer celebrations in Ree Drummond's ranch kitchen. She starts by making easy, customizable Roasted Brisket Sliders and a Big Grilled Veggie Salad, which is an ideal party side dish. Then there's a stunningly simple Lemon and Berry Icebox Cake and fizzy, fabulous Sparkling Sangria. It's summertime, and Ree is celebrating!

episodes.name: Social Sensations
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is home on the ranch making internet-famous eats with the help of her kid crew. She starts with Mexican Birria Tacos, a social media phenomenon, and Burnt Cheesecake with Blackberries. She also makes Baked Goat Cheese Pasta, her take on a massive online hit, and fun Corn Ribs to wrap up her ranch-style food trend takeover.

episodes.name: From the Freezer
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is turning everyday, frozen ingredients into delicious dishes. Shrimp and peas star in amazing Creamy Shrimp Gnocchi, and vegetables are in the spotlight in fast, fabulous All Vegetable Fried Rice. Ree transforms humble tots into a delicious Tot Waffle Breakfast Stack and wraps meatballs in frozen rolls for marvelous Mini Meatball Subs. It's all freezer treasure and fun, easy food!

episodes.name: Summer on the Ranch
episodes.overview: It's summer on the ranch, and Ree Drummond is making some simply delicious seasonal eats. First, there are Sausage and Pepper Burgers, perfect for eating inside or out. Then, there's a versatile Cobb Chicken Salad, served two ways, and a Chipotle Mozzarella Pasta Salad, perfect for parties, potlucks or a family dinner. To round it all off, there are fresh and foolproof Key Lime Pie Cheesecake Bars. It's summertime, and the cooking is easy!

episodes.name: Teenager Friendly Food
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond's got a busy day ahead cooking up food for hungry teenagers. There are tasty Chili Pie Burritos, inspired by a local fast-food favorite, followed by quick and easy Honey Pecan Chicken Strips. Next, there's a delicious Pizza Grilled Cheese that's ready in moments and fantastic Ranch Garlic Rolls that always get wolfed down. They are all 100% approved by Ree's teens -- and the rest of the family too!

episodes.name: Date Night
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is on the ranch preparing an extra special, Italian-inspired dinner for two. The main course is easy Date Night Chicken Pasta accompanied by a colorful Everything Antipasto Salad and flavorsome 4-Cheese Flatbreads. For dessert, there are divine individual Mini Tiramisus -- a fantastic finale to dinner for a couple or any other hungry twosome.

episodes.name: Kid Crew Cooking
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen cooking with her kid film crew and serving up a dish for each one. For daughter Paige, there's a Chickpea Curry Bowl, and a Jalapeno Bacon Cheeseburger Mac with son-in-law Mauricio's name written all over it. Next, there's two takes on French Bread Pizzas for daughter Alex and a decadent Layered Brownie Skillet Sundae for nephew Stuart. The kids are in the kitchen, shooting, cooking and eating.

episodes.name: Chilled Out
episodes.overview: Ree creates chilled out recipes for a very hot day. There's an amazing Salmon Nicoise Caesar Salad mashup and some marvelous Mini Muffuletta Sandwiches. Then, there's the coolest California Roll Sushi Bowl and frozen, fabulous No Churn Chocolate Dream Ice Cream. Ree's keeping things cool on the ranch!

episodes.name: Too Tired to Cook
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is on the ranch making dishes for days when you're too tired to cook. There's shortcut and very Gussied Up Ramen followed by an effortless One Pot Clam Spaghetti. Next, a fabulous mix of favorites comes together in Caprese Avocado Toast, and standby meets speedy in Tex-Mex Pantry Gnocchi Soup. Stick with Ree for fast, easy eats that make life simpler.

episodes.name: Lighter Classics
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen giving classic dishes a lighter spin. There are incredible spice-rubbed Grilled Cauliflower Steaks and fully loaded Lightened Up Nachos. She also makes a platter of Mushroom "Cheesesteak" Lettuce Wraps, and plain old mash gets a boost as Garlic Mashed Potatoes.

episodes.name: Quick, Easy Weeknight Dinners
episodes.overview: Ree serves up weeknight dinner winners, including Jalapeno Popper Tacos.

episodes.name: Never Enough Pasta
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond plays with pasta all ways, making Greek spaghetti and meatballs, butternut squash pasta casserole and hot and spicy mean green fusilli; there's even pasta for dessert in the form of fried ravioli with chocolate.

episodes.name: All in the Game
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond and her crew are cooking up football tailgate eats, kicking off with Strawberry Cobbler Squares and scoring big with Spicy Mango BBQ Turkey Meatballs. There are winning Hoagies with Quick Pepper Relish, and Ree tastes victory with her Game Day Guacamole.

episodes.name: Fall Favorites
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is celebrating autumn with seasonal favorites like a sensational Fall Salad with Spicy Brittle. She also makes Very Veggie Soup that tastes like a harvest in a bowl and her go-to dish for entertaining, Wine-Braised Chicken with Apricots. For a sweet finish, she makes Autumn Fruit Compote Sundaes.

episodes.name: Quick and Easy Sweet Treats
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is in her ranch kitchen making sweet treats. There's a picture-perfect Puff Pastry Braid filled with nuts and chocolate spread, and her 4-Berry Chimichangas are completely irresistible. She makes Cake Mix Bars packed with some of her favorite candies, and mint-flavored Icebox Sandwiches are refreshingly delightful.

episodes.name: Let's Get Toasted
episodes.overview: It's a feast for toast lovers in Ree Drummond's ranch kitchen. First, she makes Chicken Pot Pie Toast, which has a comforting, creamy filling served on crispy brioche. Then, she makes an incredible French Onion Grilled Cheese followed by Mixed Mushroom Toast with Whipped Ricotta on rustic Italian bread. Finally, Ree's Cinnamon S'mores Toast is the perfect dessert for toast fans.

episodes.name: Super Easy Italian
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen serving up simple dishes with an Italian spin. First up are Italian Beef Sandwiches with an incredible pepper salad. Then, she makes a delicious mashup with her make-ahead Spaghetti Pizza Pie followed by shortcut Garlic and Herb Mozzarella Sticks. Finally, Ree serves her take on a classic frozen dessert, No Churn Spumoni. Bellissima!

episodes.name: Best of 16-Minute Meals: Italian Family Style
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond makes a trio of marvelous 16-minute Italian meals. There's Speedy Pork Scaloppini for a fast family dinner and snappy, saucy Steak Pizzaiola that the boys absolutely adore. Then, for a get-together with her sister and nephew, she whips up Pantry Pizza Pronto and delicious Ravioli a la Betsy, named in honor of her sibling.

episodes.name: What to Bring
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen celebrating Thanksgiving with delicious dishes to take to holiday get-togethers. She starts with Caramelized Onion and White Cheddar Mac, an upscale twist on a classic, and follows that with a perfect host gift, Pumpkin Scones with Coffee Glaze for breakfast the morning after. Everyone loves a festive Gooey Brie Crescent Wreath as an appetizer, and Ree shares a fresh take on a favorite side with Spicy Parmesan Brussels Sprouts.

episodes.name: One Potato, Two Potato
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen cooking delicious dishes with different kinds of potatoes. First up is an incredible Purple Sweet Potato Soup with a fantastic pistachio crumble. Then, roasted russets and sweet potatoes star in a super easy Corned Beef Hash, and adorable marble potatoes go into a Sausage, Pepper, and Potato Skillet. Finally, humble leftover mashed potatoes are the secret ingredient in Ree's Potato Dumplings.

episodes.name: Best of Ranch Christmas Favorites
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is sharing a seasonal spread of her favorite Christmas dishes. She starts with Mexican Wedding Cookies and Holiday Bacon Appetizers, delicious vintage treats passed down by her family. Then, it's on to festive finger food with Grilled Chicken Skewers, fabulous Fig and Blue Cheese Bruschetta, and no-cook Cheesy Mini Peppers. For last-minute eats, there's a fun Christmas Tree Pizza and 10-minute Chicken Curry in a Hurry. She unwraps a stunning side with Yorkshire Pudding and tells the secret of her showstopper Prime Rib with Rosemary Salt Crust. Next, Ree beings her potluck A-game with Cheery Cheesecake Santa Hats, cute Holiday Haystacks, Shortcut Peppermint Bark and charming Christmas Tree Tarts. Plus, there's a sneak peak of Ree's holiday movie, Candy Coated Christmas.

episodes.name: Small Bites, Big Day
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is full of the holiday spirit and preparing small bites for the big day. There are festive Mini Peppermint Rolls, perfect as a treat for Santa. Then, a trio of simple, seasonal savories: very Christmassy Crispy Cauliflower Cakes, cowboy favorite Steak Bites with Spicy Blue Cheese Cream and beautiful Charcuterie Board Bites. It's all about amazing, easy apps and fun finger food.

episodes.name: Best of Pastry Perfection
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond shares a collection of her favorite pastry recipes. There's Caramel Apple Pie with a spiced pie crust, divine shortcut Puff Pastry Pizzas, and Spinach Phyllo Hand Pies. Plus, pie dough scraps get a new lease on life in a trio of treats.

episodes.name: One-Pan Crowd Pleasers
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond cooks up her favourite one-pan crowd pleasers for the holidays or anytime. There's Easy Mexican Chicken and Rice, shortcut Sheet Pan Lasagna and Sloppy Joe Mac and Cheese; Braised Short Ribs and Carrots are perfect for a celebration.

episodes.name: Best of Cowboy Breakfast
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is serving up three cowboy breakfasts, starting with Breakfast Cookies for Bryce. Then, there's a big batch of Breakfast Burritos filled with a spicy meat and egg scramble; a special delivery of Sweet Orange Rolls and Peppered Bacon.

episodes.name: 4 Ways to Start the Day
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen sharing four of her favorite ways to start the day. First, she's preparing marvelous make-ahead and portable Tex-Mex Egg Muffins and stunning Lemon Poppy Seed Pancakes that are perfect for a brunch party. Next, there are fabulous Breakfast Grits Bowls to ensure you rise and shine, and a quick Peach Breakfast Mug Cake is a delicious wake-up call.

episodes.name: Leading Vegetables
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen on the ranch celebrating the leading lights of the vegetable world. Tomato Cobbler with a fabulous cheesy herb topping is first on the menu. An ensemble of vibrant greens star in Ree's Veggie-Packed Baked Pasta, which is followed by a warming Simple Curry Pumpkin Soup. Finally, Rich Cauliflower Mash takes the sensational side dish spotlight, wrapping up four fantastic veggie dishes guaranteed to get rave reviews.

episodes.name: Pocketbook-Friendly
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is serving up four ranch-approved dishes that won't break the bank. She makes delicious Italian Chicken Meatballs over salad followed by speedy Chili Verde with all the fixins. Then, a fun Tortilla Breakfast Bake is a brilliant start to the day, and Ree makes Sweet and Salty Fudge for a totally irresistible treat.

episodes.name: Ree-freshed
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is in her ranch kitchen refreshing, or "Ree-freshing," some of her favorite eats. She makes delicious Skirt Steak and Sweet Potato Fries rustles up a Tex-Mex Chicken Pot Pie, bakes a Boozy Berry Upside Down Cake, and fries up Pesto Egg Toast.

episodes.name: Easy and Elegant
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen on the ranch, cooking dishes that are both simple and refined. First up is an awesome appetizer of Crab Cakes and 5-Ingredient Remoulade. Then she doubles up on the main course with Peppercorn-Crusted Steak with Pimento Creamed Spinach in the style of a top-notch steakhouse and a one-pan wonder, Lemon-Thyme Sheet Pan Chicken and Potatoes. Ree's final course is a simply stunning No-Bake Spiced Cheesecake.

episodes.name: Game Day Eats
episodes.overview: Ree scores big with easy game-day eats like Hamburger Potato Skins.

episodes.name: Dinner for Your Sweetie
episodes.overview: Love is in the air on the ranch, and Ree Drummond is sharing her ideas for a romantic meal for that special someone. She teams Crispy Herb-Crusted Chicken Cutlets with cheesy Mushroom and Black Pepper Pasta, and there's a beautiful Grilled Tomato and Caesar Salad that's perfect for sharing. Finally, Ree makes a super easy yet luxurious Dark Chocolate Cherry Loaf Cake for dessert.

episodes.name: New Weeknight Favorites
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen on the ranch dishing up some new favorites that add "wow" to weeknights. There's a whole new take on Cheeseburger Sliders and a super quick skillet full of Rigatoni with Broccolini and Sausage. Next up is an impressive Easy Tomato Pie followed by an irresistible meal of Pretzel-Crusted Chicken Strips.

episodes.name: Grandma Knows Best
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is paying tribute to the fabulous food she remembers from her grandma's house. First, she makes Retro Salisbury Steak in a delicious gravy. On the side, there are Skillet Scalloped Potatoes, a childhood favorite, and Grandma's irresistible Green Beans. For dessert, Ree makes a Go-To Apple Crisp that was delicious back then and is truly divine now. When it comes to good food, there's no doubt about it, Grandma knows best.

episodes.name: Foolproof Fallbacks
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond whips up four dishes that can't go wrong. First up is an easy Chocolate Sheet Cake with Vanilla Bean Frosting that the Drummond family loves. Then she makes a pasta double with delicious Stuffed Peppers and simple Tex-Mex Chicken Spaghetti. Finally, Ree puts a spin on a classic with Whiskey Pot Roast.

episodes.name: 4 Ways With Cheese
episodes.overview: Things are getting very cheesy in Ree Drummond's ranch kitchen, with four recipes and eight different cheeses! She takes Italian food to the next level with 5-Cheese Pasta and fresh mozzarella stars in her Fried Green Tomato Caprese Salad mashup. Her goat cheese-topped Fiery Goat Dip is beyond delicious, and for dessert, there's a marvelous Mascarpone Berry Bowl.

episodes.name: Citrus Twist
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is giving everything a citrus twist! She makes simple and stunning Sticky Crispy Orange Shrimp and fresh, zesty Lemon Pepper Tenderloin Pasta. Then, she adds a sweet touch with a glorious Grapefruit Tart and mixes up a pair of drinks -- a Ranch Water Cocktail and Blood Orange Ranch Water.

episodes.name: Quick and Easy Breakfasts
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is starting her day on the ranch with a fabulous foursome of quick and easy breakfasts. There are perfect, all-in-one Mini Bagel Breakfast Sandwiches and stacks of stunning, shortcut Double Chocolate Chip Pancakes. Then she makes a marvelous Mean Green Scramble in minutes, followed by irresistible Cinnamon Sugar English Muffins for something sweet.

episodes.name: Spring Dinner
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is celebrating the new season on the ranch with a simply delicious spring dinner. For starters, there's an easy Burrata and Spring Vegetable Toast, and for the main course, she makes Roasted Pork Tenderloin with bacon jam and a Cheesy Crispy Noodle Casserole on the side. To wrap things up, individual Lemon Raspberry Cakes make use of a handy shortcut. Spring is in the air, and dinner is served.

episodes.name: First Anniversary
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is celebrating her daughter Alex and son-in-law Mauricio's first wedding anniversary by cooking recipes inspired by their honeymoon in the Maldives. First, she makes delicious Grilled Vegetable Hand Rolls, followed by Herbed Lemon Pasta with Lobster and Steak Bites. There are luxurious sweet treats, too, like White Chocolate Pistachio Truffles, and to toast the happy couple, Ree's Tropical Tequila Cocktails are a taste of the Indian Ocean, ranch-style.

episodes.name: Spice It Up
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen, adding variety and spice to some Drummond favorites. She turns out Spicy Garlic Bread Sloppy Joes that pair perfectly with a Pub Salad Board with Creamy Caper Tarragon Dressing, and for dessert, she makes Spicy Ginger Sundaes with 5 Spice Crisps and Spicy Ginger Caramel.

episodes.name: Lovely Lunch for Mom
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is sharing ideas for a special lunch just for Mom. She starts with Grilled Chicken Lettuce Wraps with Italian-style filling, accompanied by an incredible, colorful Grain Salad. For dessert, she makes super quick Dark Chocolate Espresso Sundaes, and fabulous Blood Orange and Basil Wine Spritzers are a tasty way to toast moms everywhere. Cheers!

episodes.name: Super Slider Supper
episodes.overview: super slider supper is in the spotlight in Ree Drummond's ranch kitchen. Taking center stage are Ladd's Chicken Bacon Sliders with the best supporting side, an Ultimate Grilled and Chopped Salad. There's a showstopping Brown Sugar Peach Ice Box Cake, and for the grand finale, Grilled Pineapple Cocktails.

episodes.name: Post-Grad Eats
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is cooking dishes inspired by her daughter Paige, who's graduating college soon and out working calves with Ladd. There's a fabulous Street Corn Skillet that's extra delicious with Tomato Avocado Salad. Then, Ree takes shortcuts with one-pan Ravioli and Meatball Soup and whips up trendy Spicy Ginger Chili Noodles. Finally, to hit the sweet spot, there's a No-Bake Raspberry Cheesecake. It's dad-and-daughter time outdoors and perfect post-grad eats in the kitchen.

episodes.name: Noodle On It
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen noodling on one of her favorite foods -- pasta! She uses gemelli in deliciously luxurious Truffle Mac and Cheese and takes lasagna to the next level with incredible Pasta Rosettes. She tops linguine with Cauliflower Bolognese and even turns wonton wrappers into Shortcut Cheese Ravioli. That's four fresh ideas for putting a super easy spin on pasta classics.

episodes.name: Dad-Friendly Dining
episodes.overview: While husband Ladd is out feeding cattle, Ree Drummond is in her kitchen sharing a menu that every dad will love. She's kicking off with easy Cheesy Meatball Subs with Crispy Jalapeno and Onion Petals on the side. To hit the sweet spot, there's Dark Chocolate Puddings, all washed down with an Apple BBQ Tequila Cocktail. It's a great lineup for some very Dad-friendly dining.

episodes.name: Mediterranean Summer Feast
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond has summer entertaining covered with a Mediterranean feast of easy, party-worthy dishes. She's making delicious Marinated Citrus Salmon Skewers and Greek Yogurt Dip served with a one-pan Creamy Cheesy Orzotto and an irresistible vegetable platter with a hummus duo. Then, for dessert, there's simply divine Baklava-inspired Sundaes.

episodes.name: Fridge Raid
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is in her ranch kitchen raiding the fridge for some sensational eats while Ladd's out spring burning. First up, Fridge Raid Shakshuka is an incredible way to start the day, followed by easy and divine Produce Drawer Primavera. Then, Pancake Mix Dessert Crepes and Loaded Potato Pancakes round out the menu of four fabulous dishes, all thanks to Ree's fridge.

episodes.name: Keeping It Saucy
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is keeping it saucy with five store-bought stars in four delicious dishes. First, pesto is in the spotlight in cute Pesto Egg Pockets, and chimichurri and aioli take center stage in Grilled Chimichurri Shrimp Wraps. Then, cheese sauce brings Cheesesteak Burgers to the next level, and enchilada sauce is a wonderful shortcut in a Tex-Mex Skillet.

episodes.name: Book Faves
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is in her kitchen revisiting and refreshing some of her favorite recipes from her books. First up is Chicken Fried Steak Medallions, and Pantry Pasta 2.0 is a twist on an old classic. Chicken Summer Stir Fry is a new spin on a speedy standby, and then, she's showcasing Butter Pecan French Toast.

episodes.name: Summer Sweets
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is creating incredible make-ahead summer sweets. There's a fabulous party-worthy Blackberry Crepe Cake and very glamorous Strawberry Prosecco Peach Jellies. Then, Ree stocks the freezer with shortcut Cookie Ice Cream Sandwiches and fun standby Strawberry Avocado Pops. That's four delicious cool treats for hot weather coming right up!

episodes.name: Fair Food
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is putting fairground food to the test for fair-food lovers Alex and Mauricio. There are crazy Bacon Mac and Cheese Eggrolls, followed by Classic County Fair Turkey Legs served with a Sweet and Spicy BBQ Sauce. Next up, Ree makes Cheese on a Stick and, for something cool and refreshing, a Raspberry Orange Italian Ice.

episodes.name: Summer Eats 4 Ways
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond lets the sunshine into her ranch kitchen with some easy summer eats. First, she makes a stunning Coconut Shrimp Salad, followed by very seasonal Summer Vegetable Enchiladas. Then, she crafts cute Corn Cakes with an incredible avocado salsa and finishes with cool Tropical Lime Parfaits.

episodes.name: BBQ Feast
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond cooks up some delicious ideas for a barbecue feast using a Grilled Pineapple Pepper Relish to top both her Sticky BBQ Glazed Pork Tenderloin and Baked Cheese. Then, she prepares Ree's Eat Your Greens Salad on the side and a party-worthy Frozen Sangria for toasting.

episodes.name: Quick and Easy Weeknight Dinners
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is cooking up some quick and easy midweek dinners. First, she whips up delicious Grilled Steak Naan Tacos, followed by super fast Salmon Bites with Warm Brussels Sprout Slaw. Next up is Shortcut Cheesy Sausage One Pot Gnocchi and high-speed Crispy Everything Chicken Cutlets. That's four snappy and simple dinners, perfect for when time is tight.

episodes.name: Sister Sister
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond's sister Betsy is visiting, so the pair serve up Seattle-inspired recipes from Betsy's hometown. They whip up a Clam Dip that's perfect with Betsy's Potato Chips, some delicious Crispy Savory Pancakes and a Baked Fontina Cheese Board with Washington cheeses, all washed down with a refreshing and sparkling Strawberry Spritz. It's a Ree and Betsy sister act, bringing a taste of Seattle to the prairie.

episodes.name: Game Day Favorites
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is in her ranch kitchen winning big with a spread of great game-day favorites. She kicks off with Bacon Cheeseburger Dip, followed by a Salsa Trio that's in a different league. Then, she tackles Popcorn Chicken with Maple Mustard Dip and a Bratwurst Bar, both guaranteed football crowd-pleasers. So whether you are eating inside or out, Ree has your tailgate covered.

episodes.name: No Fail Fall
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond cooks some no-fail fall favorites, starting with an Autumn Steak Salad for a family-style feast and a one-pan Fall Chicken Skillet for the marvelous main course. Then, she preps Santa Fe Eggs in Purgatory for a perfect, all-day breakfast and her quick Mini Chocolate Tarts, the cutest treat she knows. They're all fool proof, delicious and seasonal fallbacks.

episodes.name: Easy Chicken 4 Ways
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond shares a collection of her favorite easy chicken recipes from times gone by. First, there's Chicken Enchilasagna, a crazy Italian-Mexican mash-up, followed by Crispy Chicken Florentine Melts, a fridge-raid treasure. Then, she makes an incredibly comforting Braised Chicken with Apricots and serves up Crispy Chicken Skins to go with drinks.

episodes.name: Housewarming Treats
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond is preparing fall-inspired sweets to have on standby for visitors at her and her sister's remodeled house in town. She puts a spin on a campfire classic with her S'mores Cookies, makes delectable shortcut Cherry Cheesecake Brownie Cups, cooks easy Apple Fritters, and blends together a divine Pumpkin Pie Snacking Granola. That's four fabulous housewarming treats for anyone that calls at the new abode!

episodes.name: Fun Family Food
episodes.overview: While Ladd and Todd are hauling hay out on the prairie, Ree Drummond makes family-friendly food with a fun spin. She kicks off with a totally over-the-top Bacon Cheeseburger Salad and celebrates her love of color with a Rainbow Pizza. Then, there's a total snack mash-up in perfect Potato Nachos and a store-bought spotlight in no-cook Cookie Dough Bars -- a perfect treat for the boys after an afternoon in the hay meadow.

episodes.name: Easy Italian
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond shares easy Italian favorites from recent years. She starts with her make-ahead frozen Pizza Pockets -- one stuffed with meat and the other with mushrooms -- and prepares a fast and fabulous Lemon Pasta Pronto in minutes. Ree's all-in-one Sheet Pan Shrimp Puttanesca is the perfect snappy supper, while her Hot and Cheesy Baked Meatballs make an easy family meal. That's four delicious flavors of Italy, frontier style.

episodes.name: Thinking Thrifty
episodes.overview: Ree thinks thrifty with meals that are budget-friendly and big on flavor.

episodes.name: Fast Thanksgiving Favorites
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond shortcuts Thanksgiving with fast favorites for the big day feast. She cuts the cooking time with a Spatchcock Turkey, bakes Stuffing Muffins and Brown Butter & Sage Pull Apart Bread, and Fruity Cream Cheese Puff Pastries for dessert.

episodes.name: Thanksgiving Leftovers
episodes.overview: Ree Drummond gives Thanksgiving leftovers a luscious new lease of life.
